title: ... is that like Easy Bake?
content: My new typographic term is: [Mojibake](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021153546/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mojibake), also known as [кракозябры](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021153546/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:Letter_to_Russia_with_krokozyabry.jpg) in Russian.
author: paul d hunt
